storyInfo: The statue of Kjeragandr nears completion as the mountain snows draw close. Leto's travels take her to Kjerag, where at the train station she happens upon an invited Victorian Viscount.

attributes.text: Great Kjeragandr, we walk beside Her.
The clouds Her feathers, the wind Her wings.
She bestows upon us sunlight and sweet rains, flesh and furs.
Benevolent Kjeragandr, we hold love for Her.
The mountains Her bones, the rivers Her tail.
We walk upon Her back, we sleep soundly in Her arms.
Merciful Kjeragandr, we sing praises to Her.
When we are afeared, it is She who soothes us.
When we are imperiled, it is She who saves us.
Kjeragandr blesses Her faithful, blesses Her mounts and beasts, that we may live in peace apart from calamity, in eternal serenity.

attributes.content: 1100, Kjerag, Paleroche territory, at the foot of Mount Karlan.
Faster!
attributes.name: Lead Soldier

attributes.content: Don't forget what we're here to do! In the back, keep pace!
attributes.name: Lead Soldier

attributes.content: Aye!
attributes.name: Stern Soldier

attributes.content: Halt! Gather up!
attributes.name: Lead Soldier

attributes.content: Form up!
attributes.name: Lead Soldier

attributes.content: Sir! Reporting in! Second Squad in formation, sir!
attributes.name: Stern Soldier

attributes.content: Very good then.
attributes.name: Lead Soldier

attributes.content: Has Third Squad reported in?
attributes.name: Lead Soldier

attributes.content: Sir! Not yet, sir!
attributes.name: Stern Soldier

attributes.content: Sir, it's possible that Third Squad has run into trouble...
attributes.name: Stern Soldier

attributes.content: Should we wait for them to catch up to us?
attributes.name: Stern Soldier

attributes.content: No. I had a feeling something like this might happen. Whoever's here first has to be the first to strike!
attributes.name: Lead Soldier

attributes.content: Aye!
attributes.name: Stern Soldier

attributes.content: I don't think I need to go over the plan again.
attributes.name: Lead Soldier

attributes.content: This is an expedition, a right proper Victorian battle! A battle for glory!
attributes.name: Lead Soldier

attributes.content: Stay alert! Do not underestimate the enemy! We will prevail! Failure is not an option!
attributes.name: Lead Soldier

attributes.content: Yes, sir!
attributes.name: Stern Soldier

attributes.content: Good, keep those spirits up!
attributes.name: Lead Soldier

attributes.content: Second Squad, march on!
attributes.name: Lead Soldier

attributes.content: Our objective—the stockherd's inn at the foot of the mountain!
attributes.name: Lead Soldier

attributes.content: We must not let these provincials drink us under the table! This time it will be them who taste defeat!
attributes.name: Lead Soldier

attributes.content: YES, SIR!
attributes.name: Stern Soldier

attributes.content: What are those Victorians up to this time?
attributes.name: Common Kjerag Man

attributes.content: Testing their alcohol tolerance, I think? It's been a whole lot of times with Riley's boys. I hear they're always drinking till they vomit.
attributes.name: Common Kjerag Woman

attributes.content: By Kjeragandr...
attributes.name: Common Kjerag Woman

attributes.content: Victorians... If they've got all this free time, then what are they even doing?
attributes.name: Common Kjerag Woman

attributes.content: Hmm...
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: No, this one's no good.
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: 'Dremomys' ... Hmm, doesn't sound half bad...
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: What do you think, Yucatan? How do you like 'Dremomys'?
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Sounds good.
attributes.name: Yucatan

attributes.content: Ugh, don't you have anything else to say?!
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Every name I suggest, you just say it sounds good!
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: ...Really?
attributes.name: Yucatan

attributes.content: But I really do think that all the names you suggest sound good, Rus.
attributes.name: Yucatan

attributes.content: Nope, can't trust you. I'll need to go over them again. I mean, we're talking about our first...
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: What I'm trying to say is that I'm definitely going to pick the best name!
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: 'Dremomys' is the one to beat for now. 'Tamiops' sounds pretty good too.
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Oh, right! We can also pick a nickname! Something like... 'Nut'!
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Pipe down already. I could hear you shouting from outside.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: And what's this about a 'Nut'? Picking out names for your kid?
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Good day, Matriarch.
attributes.name: Yucatan

attributes.content: No, definitely not...!
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: M-Mind your own stupid business!
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Alright, no more teasing.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Kjeragandr's statue is done. We'll have a ceremony for it in a couple of days.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: And I'm afraid I'll be very busy with everything involved in that. You two are going to have to handle anything that might pop up in our territory.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: I can handle it! Just relax!
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: If my darling little sister is handling it, there's no way I can relax.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: I'm not gonna mess anything up this time. You won't get to yell at me.
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Yucatan, do make sure your wife doesn't wear that gormless look on her face out in public.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Haha...
attributes.name: Yucatan

attributes.content: Laugh it up! I'm telling you, Ratatos, I've got my own plans this time!
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: And when they come to fruition, that Enciodes is going to owe us Browntails a favor, just you wait and see!
attributes.name: Sciurus
Ratatos
attributes.content: Oh?

attributes.name: Ratatos
attributes.content: Well, I guess I'll just have to wait and see.
I'll put my faith in you for now, but here's a word to the wise: try and keep a level head.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Kjeragandr's statue, the Victorians, not to mention Enciodes's scheming...
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: *sigh* A lot of big things to worry about.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: I'm afraid... we're not exactly in for a peaceful time here.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Outrageous! The Victorians have gone too far!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: You need only say the word, my Saintess, and I'll gather my men and chase the louts out of Kjerag!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Please calm down, Sir Arctosz.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: The Victorian soldiers are only here to congratulate us on the completion of Kjeragandr's statue.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: What kind of congratulating needs two thousand men? It's a pretense!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: They set up camp at the foot of Mount Karlan, those faithless bastards! Surely it would anger Kjeragandr to allow blasphemers at the ceremony!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: My Saintess! Are we really going to let them do as they please on our land?!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: You are not wrong. I am well aware that they hold no reverence for Kjeragandr in their hearts.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Then we should—!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: That is precisely why we should not.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Do you believe that our statue of Kjeragandr was built only for the faithful to revere?
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: I, well...
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Look. Look upon the statue.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Three years ago, we accepted the proposal of the Silverash clan, and it was decided that atop Lake Silberneherze we would build a statue of Kjeragandr.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: She would be solemn and stately. She would be merciful and magnanimous.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: She has become that which lifts the spirits of the people of Kjerag. She has become a symbol of Kjerag to the outside world.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: As anyone should have predicted, there will be more visitors to Kjerag in the future, and with them will come many unavoidable challenges.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: You say that, but—
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: There is no 'but', Sir Arctosz.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: The people of Kjerag's faith in Kjeragandr is unshakable. That is incomprehensible to outsiders.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Faithful or faithless, one who comes before this statue will find oneself bathed in Her light.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: But, Great Saintess, that isn't what's happening here!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: If they were just ordinary tourists, I wouldn't be sounding the alarm! But those men are the Victorian Army! It's not the same!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Are they an 'army', or are they a 'noble's guard'?
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Or might they be 'Victoria' herself?
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: They've come to Kjerag on a mission of congratulations. We have no reason to refuse or rebuff them.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Well...
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: They're clearly up to no good here, so just in case...
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: As it stands, I still do not endorse some of Sir Enciodes's overly risky decisions.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Despite all the growth that they have brought to Kjerag...
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: What has Enciodes been up to these past three years?
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: He's been making smaller moves on the mineral export issue. Could this Victorian business be another one of his disastrous schemes?
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: ...I cannot say.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: You cannot say?
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: I cannot say, Sir Arctosz.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Whatever Sir Enciodes is plotting behind our backs, it will all be in the manner that he sees most fit. I and the Vine-Bear Court alike would not be familiar with his line of thought.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Sometimes, knowing too much is not a good thing.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: You mean to say...
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: I'm just stating the facts, nothing more.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: The ceremony must go off without a hitch. For now, we'll make our preparations. Whatever we can do, as best as we can.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: I understand.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: You need not be so worried.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Whatever may come...
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Kjeragandr will protect Her people.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: What is on your mind, Saintess?
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: I was pondering what Arctosz said, about Kjeragandr's statue...
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: I hope the ceremony goes smoothly.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: It will.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: 'Kjeragandr will protect Her people', no?
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: I still hope we won't need to bother Her this time.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: You wish for Her to simply watch?
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Kjerag must learn to face risks and challenges.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: A child can't spend its whole life in its mother's arms, Kjarr.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: ...That much is true.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Ah, yet another chat has turned rather morose.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Speaking of the statue of Kjeragandr, I've half a mind to give that Arctosz a slap.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Why?
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: He got that big statue's face out of some ancient records, correct? The one it's got right now.
attributes.name: Kjarr
Kjarr
attributes.content: Did he really have to say 'Kjeragandr's appearance is preserved in these books! You are not to deviate from them!'? Who says my...?

attributes.name: Kjarr
attributes.content: *cough* Who says Kjeragandr's face is so wide?
Definitely deserves a slap or two!
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Saintess?
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Enya?
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Why'd you turn so quiet?
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: No, you're just teasing me again. Surely.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Could I...? No, could Kjeragandr... actually have such a wide face?
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: In two days, the Saintess will perform the early morning blessing, in celebration of the completion of Kjeragandr's statue.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Here is your invitation, My Lord.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Ah, Sir Enciodes, haha, that is how Kjerag's folk address you, yes?
attributes.name: Victorian Viscount

attributes.content: You are far too kind. We had come specifically for this purpose, and I would not have dared to trouble you for a special invitation.
attributes.name: Victorian Viscount

attributes.content: Worry not, my boys and I will arrive on time, all to celebrate the completion of our statue of Kjeragandr... O Blessed Kjeragandr!
attributes.name: Victorian Viscount

attributes.content: ...You seem to have adapted well to life in Kjerag.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Kjerag's scenery is a beauty, her dishes unique, and her people most lively. What's not to like?
attributes.name: Victorian Viscount

attributes.content: Not for nothing does Her Grace so often praise Kjerag's natural bounties. I dare say it's lived up to its reputation!
attributes.name: Victorian Viscount

attributes.content: ...Her Grace flatters us.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: To have esteemed guests from afar praise us in such a way is an honor for Kjerag and the Silverash clan both.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: No need to be modest, Sir Enciodes.
attributes.name: Victorian Viscount

attributes.content: Though we came here to congratulate you on the completion of the statue, I can say that I've been thoroughly captivated by Kjerag's charms during my stay.
attributes.name: Victorian Viscount

attributes.content: I hope that Her Grace, magnanimous as she is, will allow me to extend my pleasurable stay in Kjerag after the ceremony.
attributes.name: Victorian Viscount

attributes.content: Sir Enciodes, surely you'll permit me to do some sightseeing, yes?
attributes.name: Victorian Viscount

attributes.content: ...But of course.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Considering that My Lord is eager to gain a deeper understanding of Kjerag, I see no reason to refuse.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Though I would note that in this season, Kjerag's winds are bitterly cold, and many unseen dangers lurk atop the mountains.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: You and your guards will need to bundle up warmly. I would also request that you steer clear of certain dangerous areas during your tour, so as to avoid blizzards and frostbite.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Truly a most considerate warning!
attributes.name: Victorian Viscount

attributes.content: Kjerag really is a bit too chilly, but don't you worry, Sir Enciodes. That's hardly a problem for us. A thick coat should do the trick.
attributes.name: Victorian Viscount

attributes.content: Of course, speaking personally, I prefer to relax in a warm cabin with a roaring fireplace to traipsing about a snowy wonderland atop some mountain. With some fondue afterwards.
attributes.name: Victorian Viscount

attributes.content: Oh, that flavor, mmm!
attributes.name: Victorian Viscount

attributes.content: I am relieved to hear you say that, My Lord.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Relieved? Oh, heavens no, I wouldn't go that far.
attributes.name: Victorian Viscount

attributes.content: I'm afraid you can't feel too relieved, Sir Enciodes. You should keep your wits about you.
attributes.name: Victorian Viscount

attributes.content: Please, elaborate.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Oh, your relationship with Her Grace notwithstanding, I'm afraid there are many things that I'm not at ease to speak about.
attributes.name: Victorian Viscount

attributes.content: Our friend so kind to those of lower station, with such affection for Kjerag... but is this affection returned by the worthy? Patience certainly has its limits.
attributes.name: Victorian Viscount

attributes.content: And if our cooperation within Kjerag continues along a rough path, well, should Her Grace decide her patience has reached an end...
attributes.name: Victorian Viscount

attributes.content: I'm sure we would both rather not let things come to that, Sir Enciodes.
attributes.name: Victorian Viscount

attributes.content: I understand your meaning, My Lord.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: As for that 'cooperation', I will give you my response within the next few days. I will not keep Her Grace waiting too long.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Alright...
attributes.name: Victorian Viscount

attributes.content: I'm looking forward to hearing some good news from you, then.
attributes.name: Victorian Viscount

attributes.content: You'll be the first to know.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Having handed over the invitation, I have no further need to trouble you, My Lord.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: I look forward to seeing you at the ceremony in two days.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: That Kjerag fellow didn't even offer a 'hello' as he passed. What a stuck-up prick!
attributes.name: Seasoned Soldier

attributes.content: It's just a show he's put on for me.
attributes.name: Victorian Viscount

attributes.content: A show? You men of learning, spending your days playing your games...
attributes.name: Seasoned Soldier

attributes.content: Harold, I can tell you've been in a bad mood these past few days. Is he giving you trouble?
attributes.name: Seasoned Soldier

attributes.content: Perish the thought! Sure, the lad's got some skills, but nothing to lose sleep over.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Alright, enough of that. No use trying to hide from what's coming, so let's go do what must be done!
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Good to hear that you know what you're doing.
attributes.name: Seasoned Soldier

attributes.content: If that's all, then I best hurry off first. *hic* I'm counting on you to handle those fancy nobs, Harold!
attributes.name: Seasoned Soldier

attributes.content: Wait, just a moment there, did you lot go drinking without me again?
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Just one moment! Set the drink aside, did you finish the fondue I was only halfway done with?
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Zzz... *snore*...
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: (Kjerag) Grüezi... Ha det...
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Zzz... Zzz...
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Mamochka...
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Don't worry... Zzz... I can do it...
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: *unintelligible Kjerag*
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: *snore*... Zzz...
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Whoa!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Who's there?! Who has the guts to ambush me—!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: How long have I been asleep...?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Ugh... My butt hurts. This ride's real bumpy, feels like my whole body is shaking apart.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Mmm—hah. That's much comfier.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: The girl sits upright, picking up the book she was using the pass the time, which had rolled under the chair at some point, and stuffing it into her bag.
She does a big stretch, spotting something out the carriage window.
So this is Kjerag...
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: It's just snow.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: And mountains.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: It's got a few more of those than Ursus, but other than that, what's the difference? Snow everywhere, dry and cold.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: I don't see what's worth you always going on about...
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Attention passengers, the train is arriving at the terminal—the base of Mount Karlan, Kjerag.
All passengers, please prepare your luggage and alight in an orderly fashion.
For those passengers continuing on to the city, transfer at Platform 2, or take the bus.
For those passengers continuing on to Lake Silberneherze, or to see the newly completed statue of Kjeragandr, please transfer at Platform 3.
Welcome to Kjerag! We wish you a pleasant journey!
Whew! Here at last!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: 'Scuse me, pardon me, sorry about that!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Whew, finally made it out...!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Wow, crazy, the station is way too crowded!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Alright, let me see, get off the train and turn left, leave through the ticketing gates, and then...
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: ...Hey, what's the deal with this map?!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Moo—!
attributes.name: Feisty Burdenbeast

attributes.content: Whoa! Wha-What the hell!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Moo—! Moo—!
attributes.name: Feisty Burdenbeast

attributes.content: Huh? A burdenbeast? Why's there a burdenbeast in the station...?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: You look like a real tough one.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Hoho, young lady, could this be your first time in Kjerag?
attributes.name: Burdenbeast Herder

attributes.content: Not bad, muzhchina. How'd you figure that one out?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Hah, I have an eye for foreigners, I pick 'em out with just a glance.
attributes.name: Burdenbeast Herder

attributes.content: You could say that this burdenbeast's our own Kjerag specialty, one named by the Great Saintess herself!
attributes.name: Burdenbeast Herder

attributes.content: They're called, uh, what was it again... Oh right! They're called 'BangBang Burdenbeast'!
attributes.name: Burdenbeast Herder

attributes.content: 'BangBang Burdenbeast'...?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Moo, moomoo—
attributes.name: Feisty Burdenbeast

attributes.content: That's right, that's what they're called!
attributes.name: Burdenbeast Herder

attributes.content: Look here, young lady. Over here.
attributes.name: Burdenbeast Herder

attributes.content: If you want to take the burdenbeast for a ride, just press this button here, and the pen opens.
attributes.name: Burdenbeast Herder

attributes.content: Moo!
attributes.name: Feisty Burdenbeast

attributes.content: Alright, settle down, settle down.
attributes.name: Burdenbeast Herder

attributes.content: We've been taming these beasts for a long while now. Each and every one of them handpicked, and they're smart to boot!
attributes.name: Burdenbeast Herder

attributes.content: Wherever you're heading, just put the fare in that pouch on the burdenbeast when you get there, and you're solid!
attributes.name: Burdenbeast Herder

attributes.content: Haha! Sounds fun! Can I really ride this burdenbeast down the street? That's super cool! I'm in!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Hey, muzhchina, what happens if someone just... doesn't pay?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: I think you'll find, young lady, it's not quite so easy to cut and run in Kjerag!
attributes.name: Burdenbeast Herder

attributes.content: Didn't you see the disclaimer over there?
attributes.name: Burdenbeast Herder

attributes.content: Moo—! Moomoomoo!
attributes.name: Feisty Burdenbeast

attributes.content: Let's take a look...
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: 'In the case of any breach of contract by the customer, the company holds no responsibility for attacks by the supplied burdenbeast, or any other bodily injury or loss/damage of property'...
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Will the burdenbeast take the cash itself or something?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Moomoo!
attributes.name: Feisty Burdenbeast

attributes.content: Hrrmh—! Hrrmph—moo!
attributes.name: Feisty Burdenbeast

attributes.content: Well alright then! That's exactly how you should handle faredodgers!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: I'll definitely give it a try if I get a chance later!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: That's great to hear, young lady.
attributes.name: Burdenbeast Herder

attributes.content: Well, I won't keep you any longer. Welcome to Kjerag!
attributes.name: Burdenbeast Herder

attributes.content: Oh, wait a sec, muzhchina...!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: He sure walks fast. I was going to ask him which way I should go...
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: If I cross over there... Hmm, that should be right, right?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Platform 3, Platform 3...
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Halt! Gather up!
attributes.name: Seasoned Soldier

attributes.content: Form up!
attributes.name: Seasoned Soldier

attributes.content: Yes, sir!
attributes.name: Stern Soldier

attributes.content: Why are there soldiers in the train station?
attributes.name: Curious Woman

attributes.content: Did something happen?
attributes.name: Curious Woman

attributes.content: Attention!
attributes.name: Seasoned Soldier

attributes.content: Aye!
attributes.name: Stern Soldier

attributes.content: No need to worry, last time I saw them buy some knickknacks to take home. Maybe they just came for some sightseeing.
attributes.name: Bold Man

attributes.content: Though it looks like their uniforms aren't very warm. You see? That young fellow over there's so cold his nose is running!
attributes.name: Bold Man

attributes.content: (Dammit, wipe your nose already!)
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: (Where are those coats I bought you? Why aren't you wearing them?)
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: (Harold, please! Those coats you bought... they've all got 'I ♥ Snow' stitched on!)
attributes.name: Seasoned Soldier

attributes.content: (What's the problem? I think they look great.)
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: (I think they look great too.)
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: (Alright, you keep wearing yours then.)
attributes.name: Seasoned Soldier

attributes.content: (Hey, wait, who's the kid?!)
attributes.name: Seasoned Soldier

attributes.content: Me? Oh, don't mind me, you guys keep talking.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: I was just curious as to why there was a big crowd blocking the way, so I had a look-see... When I heard you all talking I couldn't help but join in.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: No need to apologize! You are a lady of excellent taste!
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Excellent taste... You mean me? Haha, you sure can call them like you see them!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: I was just looking at those coats myself! The 'I ♥ Snow' is a little kitschy, but they really are super warm!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: *cough*!
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: I gotta say, Harold, you're right. The lady really does have excellent taste.
attributes.name: Seasoned Soldier

attributes.content: Say, dedushka, you're not just ordinary tourists, are you? What are you guys doing in Kjerag?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Dedushka? Ursine for grandfather, I believe? Fair enough, I suppose you're about the same age as my no-good daughter back home.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: As for what we're here to do, haha, we're just here for sightseeing, same as you.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: I'm not just here for sightseeing though.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Oh, right, do you know how to get to Platform 3?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Platform 3?
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Yeah, I'm supposed to transfer there to get to Lake Silberneherze.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Hmm...
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: I'm guessing you don't know either then? Damn, I better go ask someone else then—
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Hold!
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Huh?!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: If it's Platform 3 you're after... then you've come to the right man!
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: If you were to ask who knows best the nooks and crannies of this terminal, I, Harold Craigavon, would be your answer!
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Oh, wow! Are you for real?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Entirely. I would never lie to a lady.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Since I took my first step off the train one month ago, I have found myself a captive of this bustling terminal!
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: I've whiled away the hours perusing every shop, to the point that I was invited to cut the ribbon for the opening of that souvenir shop there!
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: I dare say that the burdenbeasts here treat my fellows and I a touch bit kinder than your average tourist!
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Huh... You sure about that?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: I mean, look, the burdenbeast you're talking about is nibbling on that guy's clothes.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Mmm! Moo!
attributes.name: Rude Burdenbeast

attributes.content: (*chews*)
attributes.name: Rude Burdenbeast

attributes.content: It's as you say, this little fellow is a pea in our pod.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Hahahaha! I don't think your man was expecting to be stuck in that particular pod!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Hah... Whew, you're too much.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Alright, that's enough of that. I need to hit the road. Hope I can get to Lake Silberneherze before it's dark...
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Hold it. Listen.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Did you hear that, young lady?
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Hear what...? That platform announcement?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Correct. It happens to be announcing the arrival of the train at Platform 3.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: And it seems that I, coincidentally, am headed the same way as you.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: You are?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: To put it more plainly, my destination is the statue of Kjeragandr atop Lake Silberneherze.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Not just my destination, mind you. All these upstanding young fellows as well. We're all getting on that train.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: In two days' time, everyone will be gazing upon that grand statue... And that's precisely why we're here.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: This Kjeragandr statue they built, is it really that amazing...?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Perhaps so! As a tourist myself, I do think it will become quite the popular attraction.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Now, with that all said—I'm hoping I could have the pleasure of your company on our little tour, young lady?
attributes.name: Harold
